text: Ra kehi ajnaniharu yasta pani chan jo ki allaha ra akhiratako dinamathi astha rakhdachan ra je jati kharca gardachan, tyasala'i allahako samipya ra paigambarako asirvada prapta garne madhyama thandachan. Hera, avasya nai tyasale, tiniharula'i tyasako samipama lagne cha. Allahale tiniharula'i sighra nai aphno dayako patra bana'une cha. Allaha ksamadata ra bado krpalu cha
